genesis_addr_A1B2.description: Account corresponding to 0xA1B2... in genesis state (initial balance 200).

genesis_addr_1122.description: Account corresponding to 0x1122... in genesis state (initial balance 100).

genesis_addr_FEDC.description: Account corresponding to 0xFEDC... in genesis state (initial balance 100).

genesis_contract_owner.description: Account corresponding to 0xContractAddress... (likely owner/deployer) in genesis state.
